info.name: Google+ Dark Fade [ABANDONED]
info.description:
A dark theme for Google Plus. The design is inspired by vaaski's theme "YouTube Dark FADE".

[[Notice. This has some bugs, but I have no motivation to fix them as I don't use Google Plus anymore. You are allowed to copy this style, and (if you're an awesome person) continue to keep it alive and up-to-date! I'll repay you with my infinite gratitude.]]
info.additionalInfo:
(Note: Since I pretty much edited everything that I needed to make dark in this website, the update notes will get more and more boring unless Google makes a significant upgrade to their website.)

1.75: Google keeps messing up my theme, made a quick fix for it and hopefully it'll stay usable for at least a month.

1.7: Sorry for the delay, fixed a few things such as the comment sections being white

1.6: Fixed some stuff that had to be fixed, like the profile background

1.5: The notifications kind of broke (notification counter button was red instead of purple, background outline was white which didn't match with the grey) so I fixed them.

1.4: Made some adjustments for the new fullscreen photo layout, darkened some spots that weren't already dark, and fixed some bugs with the +1 button colors.

1.3: It's come to my attention that G+ released a new update that changed the layout of the comment section and post buttons. Personally I think it's ugly, and I'm working on something for 1.4 that will closely resemble the old look*. But for now, I fixed it so that it's dark. Also: Made the font editor easier to use, added the beta version of wider posts, fixed bugs, and made more improvements to the community.
*I couldn't get it to work

1.2: Made the communities look less ugly, changed the colors of the loading circle and loading bar, and fixed some bugs. 

1.1: Added the ability to customize fonts! To do this, go into the CSS editor and scroll down to Code 2. There will be instructions listed. Also fixed some ugly colors like the ones on the side menu, rounded the edges of the posts a little bit.
1.0: First stable release of the theme, I also added square profile pictures! :D

0.10: Added some optimizations, fixed the ugly post section, and added a new top bar

0.00: Unfinished release

data.title: One missing selector makes all the difference
